title: Just won a ranked game and didnt get lp for it ....
body: Ign:kooki so i was playing a ranked game and i won :D i was at 38lp and when i was done a error happen for me and my friend- ign:Sawpht we relogged and noticed that ranked is now down do to a bug but we didnt get lp for the win :( please help ! welp i got my lp but i got 10 lp ?????? i was getting 19-20 ?

replies.body: I got 9 ... I didn't even know you could get single digit LP.

> [{quoted}](name=What the tits,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oYEWGTwz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-03T04:52:33.169+0000)
>
> I got 9 ... I didn't even know you could get single digit LP.

feelsbadman

I won a ranked game as well before ranked was shut down and only received 11 lp. I would understand if we were in the middle of the game when ranked became disabled, but that is not what happened. The other team surrendered as we were pushing in, so I feel gypped out of the lp I would have received in a normal situation.

It looks like quite a few ranked games have been played since then, so I'm not sure which one I'm looking at.  What champion were you playing?  There were some server issues last night, and ranked queue had to be disabled for a few moments.  Has your match history since updated?  If the match doesn't appear by now, it's possible that it wasn't saved.  If that's the case, unfortunately there's no way to force it.  On the bright side, it looks like you're owning  in ranked today!  Congrats.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oYEWGTwz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-03T23:05:04.337+0000)

sorry didnt see this intill now but in the end i got a bit of lp so it work out :D and now plat so ^.^
